# Interface IntentLLMPromptVariablesBuilderNodeExecutionConfig

Configuration for executing intent LLM prompt variables builder nodes

This interface was referenced by `InworldBasicConfigurationSchema`'s JSON-Schema via the `definition` "IntentLLMPromptVariablesBuilderNodeExecutionConfig".

interface IntentLLMPromptVariablesBuilderNodeExecutionConfig {  
embedding_similarity_threshold?: string | number;  
max_intents_for_llm?: string | number;  
max_phrases_per_intent?: string | number;  
report_to_client?: string | boolean;  
}

##### Index

### Properties

embedding_similarity_threshold? max_intents_for_llm? max_phrases_per_intent? report_to_client?

## Properties

### `Optional`embedding_similarity_threshold

embedding_similarity_threshold?: string | number

Minimum similarity threshold for matched intents to be included in the LLM prompt

### `Optional`max_intents_for_llm

max_intents_for_llm?: string | number

Maximum number of intents to include in prompt

### `Optional`max_phrases_per_intent

max_phrases_per_intent?: string | number

Maximum number of phrases per intent to include

### `Optional`report_to_client

report_to_client?: string | boolean

Whether to report node execution result to the client
